# QuteAbilityOrAffliction

A union type which is either a [QuteAbility](QuteAbility.md)
or a [QuteAffliction](QuteAffliction/README.md).

Use [isAbility](#ability)
and [isAffliction](#affliction)
to tell whether it's an ability or an affliction.

## Attributes

[ability](#ability), [affliction](#affliction)

### ability

Returns true if this object is a [QuteAbility](QuteAbility.md)

### affliction

Returns true if this object is a [QuteAffliction](QuteAffliction/README.md)
